#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#define gc() getchar_unlocked()
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
int fastio()
{
    int x=0;
    char c=gc();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
        c=gc();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=gc();
    }
    return x;
}

bool contains(int x,int d)
{
    int p;
    while(x!=0)
    {
        p=x%10;
        if(p==d)
            return 1;
        x/=10;
    }
    return 0;
}

int main()
{
    int t,n,l,i,cnt;
    t=fastio();
    //scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        cnt=0;
        i=1;
        n=fastio();
        l=fastio();
        //scanf("%d %d",&n,&l);
        while(cnt!=n)
        {
            if(!contains(i,l))
                cnt++;
                if(cnt==n)
                    break;
            i++;
        }
        cout<<i<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
